upload.title: Image Upload
upload.content: To upload an image, click the 'Upload Image' button at the top of the screen or drag and drop your image.

layers.title: Layer Operations
layers.content:
Layers are stacked from top to bottom.
Use the duplicate button to add layers and arrows to change their order.

edit.title: Image Editing
edit.content:
For each layer, click or drag to specify areas you want to make transparent.
You can adjust the eraser size.

preview.title: 3D View
preview.content:
In the 3D view tab, you can check how layers stack together.
Use mouse or touch controls to change the viewpoint.
You can toggle the visibility of each layer to check part placement.

menu.title: Menu Functions
menu.content:
Access various functions from the menu button (≡) in the top right corner:
• Save Data: Save your current work as a JSON file
• Load Data: Load a saved JSON file to resume work
• Download PDF: Create a printable PDF file
• Reset Screen: Clear all layers and edits

export.title: Export
export.content: When you're done editing, use the PDF Export button to create a printable PDF.
